p: Total phenolic content (TPC) was determined using the Folin–Ciocalteau reagent and caffeic acid for calibration curve by spectrophotometer (CECIL, Aquaris 1100, England) at 725 nm according to Capannesi et al.13 TPC was determined by calibration curve which was achieved from defined concentration of caffeic acid absorbance, and the final results were reported as mg caffeic acid/kg of oil.
